Comment: The abortion pill kept me healthy after an incomplete miscarriage; abortion pills are healthcare and any restrictions should be based on the recommendations of doctors to their individual patients, not public servants trying to enforce their religious views on others.
Author: turndownforwomp

Comment: Anti-abortion laws (such as Texas) are already resulting in serious complications and even death in women who miscarry and need a D&C (or equivalent) to avert infection and resulting adverse effects. Several women have died from hospital's reluctance to administer mifepristone after a miscarriage until their lives are in danger -- sometimes too late to save their lives.  [If You’re Pregnant, Here’s What You Should Know About the Medical Procedures That Could Save Your Life](https://www.propublica.org/article/miscarriage-abortion-bans-dilation-and-curettage-dilation-and-evacuation)
Author: Nerd-19958
